root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 12-c-1, translated into en
root.data: Objective 12. Establish sustainable consumption and production patterns12.c Rationalize wasteful fossil fuel subsidies, through the elimination of market distortions, taking into account the national context, including through tax restructuring and phasing out harmful subsidies that are in place, demonstrating their impact on the environment, taking full account of the specific needs and circumstances of developing countries and minimizing any negative effects on the development of these countries while protecting the poor and the populations concerned12.c.1 Amount of fossil fuel subsidies per unit of GDP (production and consumption) and as a proportion of total national spending on these fuelscategory IIICategory III
